content.rendered:
Directed by Anurag Basu

Written by Samrat Chakraborty

Cast Pankaj Tripathi (Rahul Satyendra ‘Sattu Bhaiya’ Tripathi). Abhishek Bachchan (Batukeshwar ‘Bittu’ Tiwari). Rajkummar Rao (Alok Kumar Gupta). Fatima Sana Shaikh (Pinky). Aditya Roy Kapoor (Akash Chauhan). Sanya Malhotra (Shruti Choksi). Rohit Saraf (Rahul Awasthi). Pearle Maaney (Sheeja Thomas). Inayat Verma (Mini). Asha Negi (Asha). Shalini Vatsa (Lata Kutty). Bhanu Uday (Bhanu). Ishtiyak Khan (Inspector Sukumar Sinha). Anurag Basu (Yamraj / Narrator). Rahul Bagga (Chitragupta). Aman Bhagat (Shekhar / Shruti’s Fiance). Paritosh Tripathi (Manohar Jain). Aarti Ashar (Akash’s Sister-in-law). Vicky Ahuja (Alok’s Friend). Raquib Arshad (Guy at Dubbing Studio). Heather Bambrick (Ludo’s Mom / Priya’s Mom). Milind Dhaimade (Akash’s Brother). Pradeep Dubey (Reporter). Ted Dykstra (Ludo’s Dad / Priya’s Dad). Jacob Ewaniuk (Ludo / James). Addison Holley (Jenna / Catie). Rahul Jadhav (Laxman). Wasim Khan (Sattu s Goon). Gurpreet Kkaur (Nurse priya (as Gurpreet Kaur)).Ganesh Kumar. Manish Kumar (Security Guard). Niya Kumar (Fatima’s Neighbour). Hannah Levinson (Addison / Peppa). Akash Mahamana (Goon). Phoebe McAuley (Marie / Jeanne). Geetanjali Mishra (Sambhavi). Abhishek Mistry (Hotel maneger).Shamu Akhtariya Moulik. Alok Panwar (Guy at Dubbing Studio). Sakshi Parihaar (News report). Sakshi Parihar (Repoter). Krishan Rathee (Sattu’s Goon). Laxmi Rawat (Maid). Disha Sachdeva (Apple chappal girl (credit only)). Samimul Islam Shahed (Writing Credits). IH Shamim (Shamim Singer (singing voice)).Preeti Sharma.Shailja Sharma. Sundeep Sharma (Sattu’s Goon). Abhinay Raj Singh (Student). Deependra Singh (Akshay). Meena Beni Singh (Nurse). Shiv Dev Singh (Alok’s Friend). Vishal Tiwari (Goon). Varoon Varma (Mini’s father). Sunil Tamang (MARK ZUCkerbarg mishra (uncredited))

Languages Hindi

Producers Syed Zaid Ali. Zohaib Ali. Anurag Basu. Bhushan Kumar. Sanu Roy

Production Anurag Basu Production. T-Series Film
